description.value: The primal magic in your soul offers the patient earth's timeless counsel. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Atone] ritual. When you use the atone ritual on yakshas and you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead, and if you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
